MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW8 postcode area of Northwich. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:54am. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate a fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:24am on 6th March
